name: Bird and Associates
goal: To improve the skills and occupational activities, Technical and Vocational Educational Training (TVET) and Information and Guidance on Careers for people and organisations.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: European Skills Occupations Qualifications and Occupations (ESCO) and related skills development activities
